description: Multiple NVRAM-related operation functions (nvram_get, nvram_set, etc.) and potential NVRAM variable names (os_version, pmon_ver) were identified in the /usr/sbin/nvram binary file. These variables may be used to store system version information.

The core implementation of NVRAM operations, including functions such as nvram_get/nvram_set, was discovered in the libnvram.so library. These functions are called by /usr/sbin/nvram for actual NVRAM access operations.
A reference to the getenv function was found in /bin/busybox, indicating that some system utilities may access NVRAM configuration through environment variables.
